# MTLReadWriteTextureTier.tierNone

**Case**

Indicates the system doesn’t support read-write textures.

## Declaration

```swift
case tierNone
```

## Enumeration cases

- **MTLReadWriteTextureTier.tier1**: Indicates the system supports tier 1 read-write textures.
- **MTLReadWriteTextureTier.tier2**: Indicates the system supports tier 2 read-write textures.

items.description: Indicates the system supports tier 1 read-write textures.
